::Hot Rod::

He barely managed to avoid the shots. With one arm, he blocked Prime's
sword arm. The other hanf found its way to less then a centimeter from
Prime's chin. He fired several blasts. There was no room for Prime to
move. The blasts would het as soon as they left the barrels.
